DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the effectiveness of a novel patient education strategy, compared to a standard diabetic foot education. The proposed diabetic foot care education uses personal computer-animated plantar pressure data to educate patients on why and how they should care for their feet.
DOC.brief_title: Enhancing Diabetic Foot Education by Viewing Personal Plantar Pressures
